author: Jason Burns

commands.name: Rename All Instances on All Pages
commands.description: Rename all symbol instances on all pages to the name of their master.

commands.name: Rename All Instances on All Pages (Except Symbols Page)
commands.description: Rename all symbol instances on all pages, except the Symbols page, to the name of their master.

commands.name: Rename All Instances on Current Page
commands.description: Rename all symbol instances on current page to the name of their master.

commands.name: Rename Selected Instance(s)
commands.description: Rename selected symbol instances to the name of their master.

description: Rename symbol instances to the name of their master.
name: Symbol Instance Renamer
